about_the_game:
Bearly Alive – Defend. Shoot. Avenge.

In the world of Bearly Alive, food is infinite... but at what cost? You play as a gummy bear returning from the grave, determined to avenge your people after being sacrificed to the God of Food. Once a respected community, the gummy bears lost everything—now, it's time to fight back.

This intense mix of Tower Defense and Third-Person Shooter challenges you to build strategic defenses while diving into action-packed combat against relentless waves of enemies who want to invade your castle.

◑ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ▣ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ◐

🔸 Tower Defense + TPS – Set up traps and turrets, but also take matters into your own hands!

🔸 Relentless enemy hordes – Face increasingly challenging waves of enemies.

🔸 The revenge of a sweet warrior – Uncover the dark truth behind a world that thrives on gummy bear suffering.

🔸 An eldritch arsenal – Wield unique weapons and special abilities to turn the tide of battle.

◑ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ▣ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ◐

The fate of the gummy bears is in your hands. Will you break the cycle and restore your people's honor?

🔥 The feast is over. Now it’s time for revenge! 🔥

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8 or 10/11

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Dash, Shoot and run. Those monsters want to steal your candy. Build and fight for the good of bearkind in this Tower Defense and 3rd Person Action hybrid!
